name: Jungle Rewind
description:
Story

The village is in peril! The plant king threatens to destroy the world
The jungle is a special place! Specific locations open at specific times.
Go back in time after you know some of the secrets and unlock them to your advantage.

Controls

AD - Movement

W - Jump

G - Shoot

I - Go Back In Time

Credits

Art and Level Design - Gamerize

Gameplay Programmer - 123sendodo
